tool_description: Converts phonetic analyses into standardized International Phonetic Alphabet notation with customizable symbol sets and formatting options.

phoneme_data.description: Phoneme sequences to convert to IPA

symbol_set.description: IPA symbol set: standard, simplified, or broad

bracket_style.description: Bracket notation style: phonemic, phonetic, or both

error_messages: Invalid phoneme sequence: Ensure phoneme data contains valid phonemic representations.
Unsupported language: The target language is not supported for IPA transcription.
usage: Input phoneme sequences and target language. Configure symbol set, allophone inclusion, and bracket style as needed. Returns standardized IPA transcriptions.

ipa_transcriptions.description: IPA transcriptions for each input sequence

symbol_inventory.description: List of IPA symbols used in transcriptions
